meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sumptuous.
meanings.sent1: The sumptuousness of the palace's decorations impressed the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The sumptuousness of the hotel room made it feel like a royal suite.
meanings.sent3: The sumptuousness of the cake was so extravagant that it seemed almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her dress exuded a sumptuousness that outshone all others at the ball.
meanings.sent5: The sumptuousness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.

meanings.sent1: The sumptuousness of the yacht was evident in every detail of its design.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her love of sumptuousness, always seeking out the most extravagant experiences.
meanings.sent3: The sumptuousness of the gift left her speechless, overwhelmed by its opulence.
meanings.sent4: The sumptuousness of the opera house transported the audience to a world of luxury and grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The sumptuousness of the spa treatment was a decadent indulgence after a long week.

meanings.sent1: The sumptuousness of the Thanksgiving feast left everyone feeling full and content.
meanings.sent2: They gathered around the table, ready to enjoy the sumptuousness of the holiday meal.
meanings.sent3: The sumptuousness of the buffet tempted even those who had just eaten.
meanings.sent4: The sumptuousness of the banquet was fit for a king, with dishes of every kind laid out before them.
meanings.sent5: The sumptuousness of the picnic spread made it a memorable afternoon in the park.
